Package cpsc2150.extendedConnectX.models

Class GameBoardMem

  • java.lang.Object
    • cpsc2150.extendedConnectX.models.AbsGameBoard
      • cpsc2150.extendedConnectX.models.GameBoardMem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGameBoard
    public class GameBoardMem
extends AbsGameBoard
implements IGameBoard
    Allows for a more memory efficient implementation; however it can be slower
    Correspondences:
    number of rows = height of the board AND number of columns = width of the board AND # in a row to win = how many in a row to win

        public void placeToken​(char p,
                       int c)
        places token in lowest available row in column c
        Specified by:
        placeToken in interface IGameBoard
        Parameters:
        p - player token character
        c - column number
        Pre:
        c >= 0 AND p is a char value
        Post:
        position of token is stored in the map using key 'p'

      • isPlayerAtPos

        public boolean isPlayerAtPos​(BoardPosition pos,

        returns true if player token is on a specific position
        Specified by:
        isPlayerAtPos in interface IGameBoard
        Parameters:
        BoardPosition - holds [row][column] position on the board
        player - char of player token
        Returns:
        true if player char is at position, otherwise false
        Pre:

        Post:
